thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 2 of 457
thread.title: MICHAEL PROBST

author: MICHAEL PROBST
title: MICHAEL PROBST
text: Worked with Best Davis in sales for my purchase. He was very patient with me as I wasn't 100% sure what I wanted. Financing approval was quick and easy. The fact it was good for 45 days helped. They didn't have the exact car I wanted at the time so I was able to wait and work with Best until a few cars I really liked came into their stock. He immediately put the one I liked on hold. I came in the next day for a test drive and bought it the same day. I will recommend Drive Time to family and friends.
